column5: I just logged on to OFC with my Blackberry, and got redirected to OFC mobile. This is great, as most of my time to get on-line these days is with my phone. I don't have much time to get on-line at home anymore. Most large sites have this feature now, but I think this is a first for a fishing forum.  Well done boys!  Aaron
I was on it on jJdens I-touch the other night.. I gotta agree it was sweet!!
Yup, much nicer than the old low-fi version which most mobiles users used.

I will be adding Tapatalk too. It is an App for iPhone that expands the features even more. Just don't ask when..I haven't done any housework or much else since starting the upgrade, so need to get caught up a bit around here. But it should be installed within a week.
Oh Great!! Now I have something else to look at on my stupid Crackberry. But really, good for you guys, I'm not always near my computer.
Just checking posts on my I touch.
Awesome work Rick!!! This should help me keep up with the board on my iPhone!!
Had troubles when I first loaded it on my Blackberry, but went into brower options and enabled tables and style sheets and its much better!  Love this view.  Great job Rick!
I have no problem reading this post from my Mac at home I just need to figure out how to fit it into my coat pocket and make hands free calls from the road.
Looks and works pretty good on my blackberry. First post ever from my phone.
OH!  OFC Mobile..as in Mobile Phone..... I thought the Quesnels had gotten the CRV painted thus the "OFC MOBILE", that would be pretty cool.  RANDY
works great on my iphone ~ good job guys
At least I wasn't the only person clicking this thread thinking just that... hahaha!  My cellphone is for if the car breaks down, the internet is expensive enough at home lol!
Looks great. Very fast as well
I though TJ had hung some lures from a branch, and put over his bed.....Think it through.
the bite for carp was sloow today, so I logged in to the site on my Blackberry.... what a PLEASANT surprise I had when it redirected me to the new mobile version.  Great job guys.  Splashhopper
Its come along way from a place to talk about the fishing we've done, to a place where we can talk about the fishing we are DOING...
Tap-a-talk to be added in the next few days. There's an app for that...  Tapatalk info
